{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Manager",
  "description": "Pem Security Guard Network LTD is a fully licensed and insured security company with years of experience in the industry. We take pride in our highly trained security personnel, state-of-the-art technology,and a strong commitment to deliveri ng top-tier security solutions. We We offer a range of security services that meet the needs of individuals,corporate organizati ons, religious bodies,businesses and events. Our services include manned guarding, event security, corporate drivers,CCTV installati on amongst others

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Umuahia, Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Warehouse Manager to oversee and optimize our warehousing operations.
	This pivotal role involves managing the day-to-day activities within the warehouse while ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations.
	The ideal candidate will have robust experience in warehouse management and operations, alongside exceptional leadership qualities to guide and motivate a diverse team of warehouse staff.
	The Warehouse Manager will be responsible for streamlining processes to achieve efficiency, accuracy, and increased productivity within our facility.
	This includes maintaining inventory control, overseeing order fulfillment, and ensuring that the warehouse functions in a safe and efficient manner. Additionally, the successful candidate will play a crucial role in implementing best practices in our logistics and supply chain processes, thereby contributing to the overall success and profitability of the organization.
	In this role, you will collaborate closely with various departments to ensure seamless operations and timely delivery of products, focusing not only on meeting but exceeding operational targets.
	If you are passionate about logistics and have a proven track record of managing warehouse operations effectively, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity to join our team.


Responsibilities


	Manage and oversee daily warehouse operations to ensure efficiency and accuracy in order fulfillment.
	Develop and implement warehouse policies, procedures, and best practices to enhance productivity.
	Monitor inventory levels and oversee stock control to ensure optimal inventory management.
	Conduct regular training sessions for staff to promote safety and best practices within the warehouse environment.
	Collaborate with other departments to coordinate the logistics of incoming and outgoing shipments.
	Manage and motivate warehouse staff to achieve performance goals and exceed productivity targets.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations and maintain a clean, organized work environment.


Requirements


	Bachelors degree or HND in marketing, business administration or related field
	Proven experience as a warehouse manager or in a similar managerial role within the warehousing industry.
	Strong understanding of warehouse management systems and inventory software.
	Exceptional leadership and team management skills with the ability to inspire and motivate others.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities to manage various warehouse functions simultaneously.
	Knowledge of health and safety regulations and best practices in warehousing.
	Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make quick decisions in a fast-paced environment.
	Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, to collaborate with teams and departments.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and resume to:&nbsp;pemsec@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;This position is strictly for those residents in Umuahia only.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-22",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-26",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Warehouse Manager Job at Pem Security Guard Network




        
    

        
        Pem Security Guard Network LTD is a fully licensed and insured security company with years of experience in the industry. We take pride in our highly trained security personnel, state-of-the-art technology,and a strong commitment to deliveri ng top-tier security solutions. We We offer a range of security services that meet the needs of individuals,corporate organizati ons, religious bodies,businesses and events. Our services include manned guarding, event security, corporate drivers,CCTV installati on amongst others

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Manager

Job Location: Umuahia, Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Warehouse Manager to oversee and optimize our warehousing operations.
	This pivotal role involves managing the day-to-day activities within the warehouse while ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations.
	The ideal candidate will have robust experience in warehouse management and operations, alongside exceptional leadership qualities to guide and motivate a diverse team of warehouse staff.
	The Warehouse Manager will be responsible for streamlining processes to achieve efficiency, accuracy, and increased productivity within our facility.
	This includes maintaining inventory control, overseeing order fulfillment, and ensuring that the warehouse functions in a safe and efficient manner. Additionally, the successful candidate will play a crucial role in implementing best practices in our logistics and supply chain processes, thereby contributing to the overall success and profitability of the organization.
	In this role, you will collaborate closely with various departments to ensure seamless operations and timely delivery of products, focusing not only on meeting but exceeding operational targets.
	If you are passionate about logistics and have a proven track record of managing warehouse operations effectively, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity to join our team.


Responsibilities


	Manage and oversee daily warehouse operations to ensure efficiency and accuracy in order fulfillment.
	Develop and implement warehouse policies, procedures, and best practices to enhance productivity.
	Monitor inventory levels and oversee stock control to ensure optimal inventory management.
	Conduct regular training sessions for staff to promote safety and best practices within the warehouse environment.
	Collaborate with other departments to coordinate the logistics of incoming and outgoing shipments.
	Manage and motivate warehouse staff to achieve performance goals and exceed productivity targets.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations and maintain a clean, organized work environment.


Requirements


	Bachelors degree or HND in marketing, business administration or related field
	Proven experience as a warehouse manager or in a similar managerial role within the warehousing industry.
	Strong understanding of warehouse management systems and inventory software.
	Exceptional leadership and team management skills with the ability to inspire and motivate others.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities to manage various warehouse functions simultaneously.
	Knowledge of health and safety regulations and best practices in warehousing.
	Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make quick decisions in a fast-paced environment.
	Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, to collaborate with teams and departments.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and resume to: pemsec@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: This position is strictly for those residents in Umuahia only.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Operations Officer",
  "description": "ConSol Limited, is the leading provider of Contact/Call Center services and Customer Management Solutions in Nigeria.With over 13 years of experience working with leading brands across 17 industries in Nigeria, our consulting service is focused on helping you effectively acquire, satisfy, engage and retain your customers through your contact centre operations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Head of Operations / Founding Team

Role Overview


	The Operations Officer will manage the daily operational activities related to fleet tracking, camera installations, system uptime, and reporting.
	You&rsquo;ll work directly with suppliers, technicians, and clients to ensure all vehicles are properly monitored, maintained, and performing safely.
	You&rsquo;ll also play a key role in generating operational insights from driver and vehicle data,turning numbers into actions that improve safety and efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee installation, activation, and maintenance of vehicle trackers and dashcams.
	Monitor fleet data (location, driver behaviour, system uptime) using the SafeRide+ dashboard.
	Generate daily, weekly, and monthly performance reports on driver behaviour, route compliance, and safety incidents.
	Liaise with hardware suppliers, SIM/data providers, and technical vendors to ensure devices and connections remain active.
	Coordinate with drivers and partners to address hardware faults, system alerts, or connectivity issues.
	Track SIM usage and manage data plans efficiently.
	Maintain accurate records of all operational activities, assets, and incidents.
	Support development of new operational procedures and KPIs.
	Provide feedback to engineering and product teams to improve system reliability and reporting tools.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, Engineering, or related field.
	2&ndash;4 years of experience in fleet management, logistics operations, or telematics systems.
	Familiarity with vehicle tracking or dashcam monitoring software.
	Strong reporting and Excel/Google Sheets proficiency.
	Excellent coordination, communication, and vendor-management skills.
	Attention to detail and proactive problem-solver.
	Comfortable working in fast-moving start-up environments.


Preferred (Not Mandatory):


	Prior experience working with fleet tracking systems
	Understanding of driver behaviour analytics and safety reporting.
	Technical literacy (basic understanding of APIs, SIM configuration, data monitoring tools).
	Experience managing field technicians or hardware installations.





Why Join Us


	Be part of a first-of-its-kind mobility safety start-up solving a real problem across Africa.
	Work directly with the founding team on a high-impact operational rollout.
	Opportunity to grow into a Fleet Operations Lead or COO-track role as the company scales.
	Competitive pay + performance bonuses + equity consideration (for top performers).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a short cover note to:&nbsp;apply@consollimited.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Operations Officer Job at ConSol Limited




        
    

        
        ConSol Limited, is the leading provider of Contact/Call Center services and Customer Management Solutions in Nigeria.With over 13 years of experience working with leading brands across 17 industries in Nigeria, our consulting service is focused on helping you effectively acquire, satisfy, engage and retain your customers through your contact centre operations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Head of Operations / Founding Team

Role Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Operations Officer will manage the daily operational activities related to fleet tracking, camera installations, system uptime, and reporting.
	You’ll work directly with suppliers, technicians, and clients to ensure all vehicles are properly monitored, maintained, and performing safely.
	You’ll also play a key role in generating operational insights from driver and vehicle data,turning numbers into actions that improve safety and efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee installation, activation, and maintenance of vehicle trackers and dashcams.
	Monitor fleet data (location, driver behaviour, system uptime) using the SafeRide+ dashboard.
	Generate daily, weekly, and monthly performance reports on driver behaviour, route compliance, and safety incidents.
	Liaise with hardware suppliers, SIM/data providers, and technical vendors to ensure devices and connections remain active.
	Coordinate with drivers and partners to address hardware faults, system alerts, or connectivity issues.
	Track SIM usage and manage data plans efficiently.
	Maintain accurate records of all operational activities, assets, and incidents.
	Support development of new operational procedures and KPIs.
	Provide feedback to engineering and product teams to improve system reliability and reporting tools.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, Engineering, or related field.
	2–4 years of experience in fleet management, logistics operations, or telematics systems.
	Familiarity with vehicle tracking or dashcam monitoring software.
	Strong reporting and Excel/Google Sheets proficiency.
	Excellent coordination, communication, and vendor-management skills.
	Attention to detail and proactive problem-solver.
	Comfortable working in fast-moving start-up environments.


Preferred (Not Mandatory):


	Prior experience working with fleet tracking systems
	Understanding of driver behaviour analytics and safety reporting.
	Technical literacy (basic understanding of APIs, SIM configuration, data monitoring tools).
	Experience managing field technicians or hardware installations.





Why Join Us


	Be part of a first-of-its-kind mobility safety start-up solving a real problem across Africa.
	Work directly with the founding team on a high-impact operational rollout.
	Opportunity to grow into a Fleet Operations Lead or COO-track role as the company scales.
	Competitive pay + performance bonuses + equity consideration (for top performers).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a short cover note to: apply@consollimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Video Content Creator",
  "description": "Seedbuilders is an Incubator and Accelerator, Knowledge Transfer Center, Technology and Research Startup Support Platform and a Coworking Community. We operate as an incubator and launchpad for startups and social projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Video Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Part-time (Hybrid: One or two days for a physical shoot at the hub or studio).

Job Summary


	The Video Content Creator will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and producing high-quality video content for social media, campaigns, and brand storytelling.
	The ideal candidate should be passionate about visual storytelling, digital trends, and creating content that drives engagement and conversions.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, shoot, and edit engaging video content for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other digital platforms.
	Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to develop video concepts that align with brand goals and campaigns.
	Produce explainer videos, promotional ads, tutorials, and behind-the-scenes content.
	Optimize videos for different platforms and formats (vertical, horizontal, reels, etc.).
	Create short-form content that enhances brand awareness and engagement.
	Stay up to date with video trends, transitions, and editing techniques across social platforms.
	Manage video assets, footage, and ensure consistent branding across all content.
	Work with copywriters and designers to ensure videos support the overall message and tone.
	Occasionally handle live coverage of events or client showcases.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree minimum.
	1 year of experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@seedbuildersng.com&nbsp;using &quot;Video Content Creator Application&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Video Content Creator Job at Seedbuilders Innovation Hub




        
    

        
        Seedbuilders is an Incubator and Accelerator, Knowledge Transfer Center, Technology and Research Startup Support Platform and a Coworking Community. We operate as an incubator and launchpad for startups and social projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Video Content Creator

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Part-time (Hybrid: One or two days for a physical shoot at the hub or studio).

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Video Content Creator will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and producing high-quality video content for social media, campaigns, and brand storytelling.
	The ideal candidate should be passionate about visual storytelling, digital trends, and creating content that drives engagement and conversions.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, shoot, and edit engaging video content for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other digital platforms.
	Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to develop video concepts that align with brand goals and campaigns.
	Produce explainer videos, promotional ads, tutorials, and behind-the-scenes content.
	Optimize videos for different platforms and formats (vertical, horizontal, reels, etc.).
	Create short-form content that enhances brand awareness and engagement.
	Stay up to date with video trends, transitions, and editing techniques across social platforms.
	Manage video assets, footage, and ensure consistent branding across all content.
	Work with copywriters and designers to ensure videos support the overall message and tone.
	Occasionally handle live coverage of events or client showcases.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree minimum.
	1 year of experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@seedbuildersng.com using "Video Content Creator Application" as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Food Technologist (NYSC)",
  "description": "Moli Food&nbsp;is a registered business located in Abuja, Nigeria. We specialize in cultivating organic mushrooms and processing various natural agricultural products. Our mission is to promote health and tradition through authentic Nigerian foodstuffs and seasonings.We are sustainable farmers who use natural methods to grow a diverse range of crops and agricultural products, which we also process with care. Our selection includes common favorites as well as rare and unique varieties. All our products are rich in nutrients and offer numerous health benefits, supporting overall wellness and traditional Nigerian cuisine.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Food Technologist (NYSC)
Job Location:&nbsp;Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Qualifications


	Educational: Diploma or Degree in Food Technology.
	Skills: Computer literate.
	Communication: Smart, articulate, fluent in English.
	Knowledge &amp; Experience: Strong understanding of food chemicals, processing, and packaging.
	Plus: Prior experience in processing and packaging of food products is advantageous.


Salary
Competitive and attractive; commensurate with experience.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobadvertiser95@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-23",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "MoliFoods"
    
  },

Food Technologist (NYSC) Job at Moli Food




        
    

        
        Moli Food is a registered business located in Abuja, Nigeria. We specialize in cultivating organic mushrooms and processing various natural agricultural products. Our mission is to promote health and tradition through authentic Nigerian foodstuffs and seasonings.We are sustainable farmers who use natural methods to grow a diverse range of crops and agricultural products, which we also process with care. Our selection includes common favorites as well as rare and unique varieties. All our products are rich in nutrients and offer numerous health benefits, supporting overall wellness and traditional Nigerian cuisine.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Food Technologist (NYSC)
Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Qualifications


	Educational: Diploma or Degree in Food Technology.
	Skills: Computer literate.
	Communication: Smart, articulate, fluent in English.
	Knowledge & Experience: Strong understanding of food chemicals, processing, and packaging.
	Plus: Prior experience in processing and packaging of food products is advantageous.


Salary
Competitive and attractive; commensurate with experience.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobadvertiser95@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
